data.title: The Royal Sonesta Boston Hotel
data.meta_description: The Royal Sonesta Boston is a Cambridge, MA hotel located near Boston. Enjoy great amenities with mesmerizing views of the city and the Boston Skyline.
data.text:
We love your furry friends as much as you do.

Sonesta is proud to invite your cuddly companions and provide special amenities like comfy pet beds, bowls, waterproof mats, and treats at check-in. Well greet your pet with an arrival letter outlining our local recommendations for a pawsome stay.

The Royal Sonesta Boston is pet friendly and welcomes well-mannered pets, with no breed or weight restrictions. Up to two pets are permitted per suite.

$75 fee per stay applies.

Discover our Pets Are Welcome At Sonesta (PAWS) policy.

We strive to make your stay as comfortable as possible and to accommodate the needs of our guests with disabilities. Please contact the hotel if you have any special requests relating to your disability.

The following areas are accessible:

Public entrance

Route from the hotels public entrance to

The registration area

The accessible guest rooms

Restaurants

The meeting room/ballroom area

The fitness center

The swimming pool

The business center

Registration desk

Concierge desk

Public restroom

Restaurant

Accessible parking spaces for vans and cars in self-parking facility

Fitness center

Swimming pool

The following areas are not fully accessible:

Business center

Additional accessibility information:

Guest room TVs have closed captioning or closed caption decoders provided

Hotels valet parking accepts vehicles specially outfitted for wheelchair users

Hotel has a TTY for guest use

Service animals are welcome

Braille and tactile signage is provided for permanent rooms and spaces

Hotel employees will read menus and other printed/visual information and provide verbal directions to locations in the hotel to guests who are blind/low vision

Audio/visual fire alarms in common area

Information About Accessible Guest Suites

Our hotel has the following accessible suite types:

Hearing Accessible Queen River View

Hearing Accessible King River View

Mobility/Hearing Accessible Queen River View, Tub

Mobility/Hearing Accessible King City View, Tub

Mobility/Hearing Accessible King River View, Roll-in Shower

Mobility/Hearing Accessible King Suite, River View, Roll-in Shower

Rooms designated as mobility accessible have features for guests with mobility disabilities, including, but not limited to:

Doorways that provide 32 of clear width

Roll-in shower or tub with grab bars (specific bathing fixture type is indicated for each room in the room name)

Lowered light switches and thermostats

Toilets with grab bars

Accessible vanity

Accessible route to all parts of the room

Rooms designated as hearing accessible have features for guests who are deaf or hard of hearing, including visual alarms and notification devices.

For general amenities associated with each suite type, please see our rooms page.

Please call us at 617.806.4200should you have further questions about accessibility or email us at reservations@sonesta.com.

At The Royal Sonesta Boston, we are proud to offer a wide array of amenities and services designed to make your stay as comfortable and effortless as possible.

Additionally, if you have any special requests for your stay, we would love to make them happen. Contact us at 617.806.4200.

Indoor Swimming Pool

Measuring a spacious 30' x 45', this is one of the largest swimming pools in the Boston and Cambridge area. With a salt-based water system, it is gentle on the skin and eyes for a comfortable swimming experience. Whether you're looking for a refreshing dip or a challenging workout, our lap lanes and leisure area provide ample space for both.

Hours

Daily: 6:00AM  10:00PM

Seasonal Terrace

Recharge after a thorough workout, or simply soak up the sun on our seasonal sundeck.

Boston Jogging Course

Enjoy running along the Charles River! Our location offers easy access to a range of running routes with varying distances and levels of difficulty, allowing you to select the one that best fits your fitness level and ability.

Fitness Center

Maintain your fitness regimen even when you're on the go, with our state-of-the-art fitness center at The Royal Sonesta Boston. Get fit anytime, day or night, with 24-hour access. Our fitness center is equipped with modern cardio and strength training equipment, including a Peloton Bike, and features complete locker room facilities.

Art Collection

Take a stroll and discover the original art by some of the most prominent and esteemed contemporary artists of our time at The Royal Sonesta Boston.

Parking

Take advantage of parking privileges at The Royal Sonesta Boston. Our covered parking garage is located just steps from the front entrance and offers overnight self-parking for a fee of $45.

Transportation

Explore the city from The Royal Sonesta Boston! With convenient access to public transportation, taxi, and limousine services, discovering all that Boston and Cambridge have to offer is a breeze.

Housekeeping

Enjoy full-service cleaning of your guest rooms daily throughout your stay. At The Royal Sonesta Boston, the safety and well-being of our guests are our highest priority.

Discover the art of dining at ArtBar, where creativity meets seasonality in every bite. Immerse yourself in the rich flavors of New England with dishes expertly crafted using only the freshest regional ingredients.

Art-Infused Dining

At ArtBar, enjoy a menu that caters to every type of dining occasionwhether it's a quick bite, happy hour, romantic dinner, or gathering with friends. As you indulge in creative dishes, a well-curated wine selection, and unique seasonal cocktails, immerse yourself in the hotel's breathtaking art collection.

Chef

Chef Dave Mahady brings his culinary expertise to ArtBar as the mastermind behind the menu. He carefully selects the ingredients, oversees the preparation, and ensures each dish provides a true taste of New England. Don't miss out on Chef Dave's top recommendation - the Lamb Burger, featuring pickled red onions, chimichurri, feta, and a juicy fried green tomato on a pretzel bun!

Outdoor Dining in Boston

ArtBar has been recognized as a top patio in Boston by BostInno and featured in NECN's "Boston's Best Patios" segment. Additionally, Zagat has named ArtBar as one of the best outdoor dining spots in Cambridge.

Private Dining in Boston

ArtBar provides private dining options for gatherings and celebrations. With a relaxed atmosphere, the venue can accommodate groups of 10 to 60 guests. The ArtBar staff is eager to help with menu choices and pairing the perfect wine for your event.

View the ArtBar Website

Reserve a Table

When you stay at The Royal Sonesta Boston, exploring all the wonderful sights and experiences the city has to offer is made effortless. Whether you're looking to immerse yourself in the local culture, try out the delicious cuisine, or simply soak up the sights, The Royal Sonesta Boston puts you right in the heart of it all.

Charles River

Explore picturesque bridges and promenades amid a wealth of natural and historical landmarks along the Charles River. The Royal Sonesta Boston sits on the shores of the Charles River.

TD Garden

Be a part of the action at a nail-biting Boston Celtics game. Cheer on the legendary Boston Bruins. Enjoy one of the spectacular musical concerts and live performances. Find it all at the famed TD Garden, located only 1 mile from our hotel in Cambridge.

New England Aquarium

Discover the mesmerizing aquatic world, including northern fur seals, giant Pacific octopuses, and African penguins, at the New England Aquarium, just a short 2.2-mile drive from The Royal Sonesta Boston.

Fenway Park

Explore the historic and iconic Fenway Park, home of the Red Sox and one of the oldest stadiums in Major League Baseball, just a quick 2.4 miles from our hotel in Boston, MA.

Universities

Step into the halls of greatness and visit the nation's most prominent universities. Experience the cutting-edge innovation of MIT (1.3 miles away), the diverse education at Suffolk (1.9 miles away), the academic excellence of Boston University (2.6 miles away), the dynamic research at Northeastern University (2.6 miles away), and world-renowned Harvard (3.1 miles away).

Faneuil Hall

Walk in the footsteps of history at Faneuil Hall, the iconic site of memorable and inspiring speeches by famous Americans. The Royal Sonesta Boston is just 2 miles away from the historic Faneuil Hall.

Boston Common

Embark on a journey through history and nature at Boston Common, the oldest public park in the United States and a gem in the heart of Massachusetts. Stroll through its sprawling green spaces, play sports, take a jog, or simply relax and unwind with a peaceful picnic. The Royal Sonesta Boston is just 1.7 miles from this urban oasis.

Museum of Science

Immerse yourself in a world of knowledge and fun at the Museum of Science with over 500 interactive exhibits and live presentations on the exciting STEM fields of science, technology, engineering, and math. The Museum of Science is a short walk away (0.3 miles) from our Boston hotel.

Duck Boats

See Boston from a whole new perspective as you take in its distinctive neighborhoods and dive into the Charles River for stunning views of the Boston and Cambridge skylines. Find the Boston Duck Tour just 2.3 miles from our hotel in Cambridge, MA.

Boston Convention and Exhibition Center

Discover the revolutionary BCEC, a convention center made by users for users. Enjoy exceptional customer service and the latest technology, and create your ideal event with its generous exhibit, meeting, and function space. BCEC is 3.9 miles from our Boston hotel.

Hiking near Boston

Discover the beauty of Massachusetts at nature reserves such as Blue Hills Reservation and Middlesex Fells Reservation, where you can hike along pristine trails and admire breathtaking scenery.

Ski Resorts near Boston

Escape to the mountains and feel the thrill of skiing and snowboarding! With a variety of options just a short drive from our Boston hotel, guests can hit the slopes at top ski resorts such as Wachusett Mountain Ski Area, Nashoba Valley Ski Area, Blue Hills Ski Area, Ski Bradford, and McIntyre Ski Area.

Camping near Boston

Escape the hustle and bustle and immerse yourself in the beauty of the Massachusetts countryside with a camping adventure at one of the top sites near Boston including Boston Minuteman Campground, Normandy Farms Family Camping Resort, or Shawme-Crowell State Forest Campground.

Biking

Explore the beauty of Boston on two wheels! Whether you prefer a leisurely ride along the Charles River or a more adventurous mountain bike experience, the city's well-established network of bike paths and bike-friendly roads, paired with its parks and green spaces, offer endless opportunities for cyclists of all levels.

Jogging

Hit the pavement and explore the sights of Boston! With its abundance of parks and scenic waterfronts, take in the city's breathtaking views while getting your run in. Whether you like the tranquil beauty of the Charles River Esplanade or the energy of the city's well-established running clubs, there's something for every jogger in Boston!
